Glue Up is present in more than 50 countries around the world with offices in the Asia Pacific, Europe, Africa, Latin America and in the USA.
We are Glue Up
How Can Glue Up Help?
How Did We Get Here
Our founders Eric L. Schmidt and Olivia Jingshu Ji launch EventBank to create an event management software that could help them scale up their own events.
Through partnership with different Associations and Chambers of Commerce, we develop our award-winning Membership Management module.
People do more and more work from their phones so we launch mobile apps to bring EventBank all-in-one functionalities to mobile devices.
We expand our presence through Asia Pacific region by opening offices in Singapore and Hong Kong, as well as in Russia via joint-venture.
We start receiving awards and get recognized as Top Tech Company in the Greater Washington Region by Northern Virginia Technology Council.

Since COVID-19 hit our Asia-Pacific operations and then our other global offices, we have worked non-stop to come up with better technology for our clients to engage with their communities even when meeting face to face isn’t possible. Launch of new Community features marks an important milestone in our story.

We outgrow EventBank and rebrand to become Glue Up to better represent our company's evolution and mission we have been on since day one. We continue pushing boundaries to transform professional communities around the world through our technology.
Glue Up is an all-in-one CRM platform that helps you build and grow your community through events, memberships & other digital tools.
